abstract: Unusually warm December weather in New York City has put damper on Christmas spirit for some, as traditional thoughts of snow and cozy evenings with loved ones fall flat; forecasts for remainder of month project average temperature of 51.6 dergees, 14.1 degrees above normal of 37.5.
lead_paragraph: The city has been so warm that the average temperature for the month could be 14 degrees above normal, the largest such deviation on record, and the high for Dec. 24 is forecast to be 73.

headline.main: Unseasonable Greetings in a New York Searching for Jack Frost
headline.print_headline: Unseasonable Greetings in a New York Searching for Jack Frost
